ing: 2 cups shredded Mexican-style processed cheese food
1 (4 ounce) can deviled ham meat spread
des: "My grandmother first made this recipe a few years ago. It quickly became a family favorite. The spread is best if allowed to chill overnight. Try it with tortilla chips, potato chips, or crackers."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the Mexican-style processed cheese food, cream cheese, deviled ham meat spread, green onion, milk and Worcestershire sauce. Chill at least 3 hours before serving.
